task: Identify the hardware requirements for using the latest version of Adobe Photoshop on a Mac.
Identify the hardware requirements for using the latest version of Adobe Photoshop on a Mac.
user_action_and_explanation: type 'Adobe Photoshop latest Mac hardware requirements' into the search bar to find relevant information on the hardware specifications needed for the latest version of Adobe Photoshop on a Mac.
observation: The search results display the minimum hardware requirements for Adobe Photoshop on macOS. According to the visible snippet, it includes: a multicore Intel processor or Apple Silicon processor (2 GHz or faster with SSE4.2 or later), macOS Big Sur (version 11.0) or later, 8 GB of RAM, and a GPU with Metal support and 1.5 GB of GPU memory. This information should suffice for understanding the necessary hardware specifications.
